page.title: 16C of E Hittisleigh Church
page.content: The Rector of St Andrews Parish Church is the Rev. Charles J L Napier, who resides in Drewsteignton and is also Rector of that parish and of Spreyton. The Churchwardens are Mrs Shiela Nicholson and Mr Clive Clark. The nave of the church dates from 1250-1300, and the south aisle is 15th century. Times of services vary according to the Sunday in the month, with 11 am Holy Communion on the first Sunday, a Family Service at 3 pm on the second: Evensong at 6.30 pm on the third Sunday and 9.30 am Communion on the fourth. The average attendance is 15, but many more at major festivals.
